trans-unit.source: Enables the user to select a single option from a group of choices when paired with other RadioButton controls.
trans-unit.target: Permite ao utilizador selecionar uma única opção de um grupo de opções quando com outros controlos de RadioButton.

trans-unit.source: The RadioButton control can display text, an <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, or both.
trans-unit.target: O controlo de RadioButton pode apresentar o texto, um <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, ou ambos.</xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: When the user selects one option button (also known as a radio button) within a group, the others clear automatically.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador seleciona um botão de opção (também conhecido como um botão de opção) dentro de um grupo, os outros limpar automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: All RadioButton controls in a given container, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, constitute a group.
trans-unit.target: Todos os RadioButton controla num determinado contentor, tal como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, constituem um grupo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: To create multiple groups on one form, place each group in its own container, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: Para criar vários grupos de um formulário, coloque cada grupo na sua própria contentor, tal como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox>

trans-unit.source: RadioButton and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> controls have a similar function: they offer choices a user can select or clear.
trans-unit.target: RadioButton e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>controlos tem uma função semelhante: oferece opções de um utilizador possa selecionar ou desmarcar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: The difference is that multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> controls can be selected at the same time, but option buttons are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: A diferença é que vários <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>controlos podem ser selecionados ao mesmo tempo, mas os botões de opção são mutuamente exclusivos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A> property to get or set the state of a RadioButton.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A>propriedade obter ou definir o estado de um RadioButton.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: The option button's appearance can be altered to appear as a toggle-style button or as a standard option button by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Appearance%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Aspeto do botão de opção pode ser alterado de aparecer como um botão de alternar estilo ou como um botão de opção padrão, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Appearance%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Appearance%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The default view of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> has its text aligned to the right of the button and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: A vista predefinida do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>tem o respetivo texto alinhado à direita do botão e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value determining the appearance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor de determinar o aspecto do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the Appearance value is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance>, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control is drawn with a circular check box.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor de aspeto estiver definido como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance>, em seguida, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>controlo é desenhado com uma caixa de verificação circular.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance>

trans-unit.source: If the value is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance>, then the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> is drawn as a control that can be toggled to an up or down state.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor estiver definido como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance>, em seguida, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>é desenhado como um controlo que pode ser ativado para uma cópia de segurança ou para baixo do Estado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance>

trans-unit.source: Either type can display text, an image, or both.
trans-unit.target: O tipo pode apresentar texto, imagem de uma ou ambos.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído não é um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Appearance"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Appearance*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Appearance*>alterações do valor de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Appearance*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked*> value and the appearance of the control automatically change when the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked*>valor e o aspecto do controlo alterar automaticamente quando o controlo é clicado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked*>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A> value is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> portion of the control must be checked in code in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event handler.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A>valor está definido como `false`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>parte do controlo tem de ser verificado no código no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>processador de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control group, this property ensures that only one of the controls is checked at a given time.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>faz parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>Esta propriedade do grupo de controlo, assegura que apenas um dos controlos é verificado num determinado momento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>

trans-unit.source: If the AutoCheck property is set to `false`, a group of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls will not act as a mutually exclusive group and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A> property must be updated in code.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade AutoCheck estiver definida como `false`, um grupo de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>controlos não irão funcionar como um grupo mutuamente exclusivo e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A>propriedade têm de ser atualizada no código.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked*> value and the appearance of the control automatically change on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref> event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked*>valor e o aspecto do controlo automaticamente alterados a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"> </xref> evento; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the check box portion of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a localização da caixa de verificação parte a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the valid <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos válido <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The assigned value is not one of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído não é um do <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is checked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o controlo está seleccionado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the check box is checked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a caixa de verificação está selecionada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked*>alterações de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo objecto de acessibilidade para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Se não chame o método CreateAccessibilityInstance explicitamente, este será chamado quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>propriedade é referenciada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the <xref:Accessibility> assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Obter ou definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>propriedade, tem de adicionar uma referência para o <xref:Accessibility>assemblagem instalada com o .NET Framework.</xref:Accessibility> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.RadioButtonAccessibleObject> for the control.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.RadioButtonAccessibleObject>para o controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.RadioButtonAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os parâmetros de criação necessários quando o identificador de controlo é criado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> que contém os parâmetros de criação necessários quando o identificador do controlo é criado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho predefinido do controlo.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> with a <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*> of 104 and a <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*> of 24.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> com um <> </> *> de 104 e um <> </> *> de 24.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o utilizador faz duplo clique o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> style bit is set to `false` for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control, and the DoubleClick event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>bit de estilo está definido como `false` para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>controlo e DoubleClick o evento não é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref> control with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o utilizador faz duplo clique o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"> </xref> controlo com o rato.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> style bit is set to `false` for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control, and the MouseDoubleClick event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>bit de estilo está definido como `false` para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>controlo e MouseDoubleClick o evento não é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckedChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.CheckedChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnCheckedChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnCheckedChanged também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A> property is set to `true` when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A>propriedade está definida como `true` quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>controlo é clicado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.Checked%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton.AutoCheck%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: If the user enters the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> control by using the arrow keys, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> will raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Se o utilizador introduz o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>controlo utilizando as teclas de seta de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>irá elevar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated*> method.
trans-unit.target: Substitui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated*>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnHandleCreated*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o processador de eventos através de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [e gerar eventos de processamento](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnMouseUp method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnMouseUp também permite que as classes derivadas processar o evento sem anexar um delegado.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Este é a preferido técnica para processar o evento de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Generates a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref> event for the control, simulating a click by a user.
trans-unit.target: Gera um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"> </xref> eventos para o controlo, simulando uma clique por um utilizador.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic*> method.
trans-unit.target: Substitui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic*>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessMnemonic*>

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: O carácter a processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was successfully processed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o caráter foi processado com êxito; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can give the focus to this control using the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o utilizador pode dar o foco para este controlo utilizando a tecla de tabulação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can give focus to this control using the TAB key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o utilizador pode dar o foco para este controlo utilizando a tecla de tabulação; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the text on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o alinhamento do texto no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído não é um do <xref href="System.Drawing.ContentAlignment"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.ToString*> method.
trans-unit.target: Substitui o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.ToString*>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.ToString*>

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"></xref> that indicates whether it is checked.
trans-unit.target: Uma representação de cadeia do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton"> </xref> que indica se está seleccionado.
